I fucking hate ntr, but I'm not going to call out anyone who likes it. We will have our vanilla doujin, you can have your ntr doujin, and we can all live in peace. For such a cute and nice fetish, it's surprising how aggressive vanilla fans are towards ntr fans. If I had a penny for every mean comment left by a vanilla fan saying that "ntr is trash" and "anyone who likes ntr is a cuck", I'd be Jeff Bezos. If I had a penny for every mean comment left by an ntr fan towards vanilla fans, I'd be starving and homeless.
